column1: }}'''Elphir''' was the twenty-third [[Prince of Dol Amroth]].
Elphir was the oldest son of the four children of [[Imrahil]]. He was born in {{TA
column2: 2987}}, and was already a man by the time of the [[War of the Ring]], but no feat of his was recorded. He had two brothers, [[Erchirion]] and [[Amrothos]], and a sister, [[Lothíriel]].
67}}, he was succeeded by his son [[Alphros]].<ref>{{PM
column3: Elendil}}, ''The Line of Dol Amroth'', p. 221</ref>
